title: Just had a 10 second total lagout on all players in my game, abilities used no damage appeared.
body: In my most recent game all players just lagged out and back in after a over 10 second freeze, anyone else?

replies.body: Yikes it happened for everyone in the game, even the other team? I'm not seeing any major servers issues right at this moment, so hopefully that was just some weird hiccup. Were you all able to reconnect and finish up the game normally or are you still having this total lagout happen often?
